localizedText.descSignatureKey: Key which is used to sign the export files
localizedText.configPageMaxEntries: Maximum number of entries to be displayed
localizedText.descConfigPageMaxEntries: Maximum number of entries to be displayed on the configuration page
localizedText.descDatabaseMaxEntries: Maximum number of entries to be saved in the database
localizedText.remainingDatabaseEntriesHintLimit: Limit for the hint of the remaining database entries
localizedText.descRemainingDatabaseEntriesHintLimit: This value indicates the minimum number of available entries that should be left in the database before triggering a notification to show the remaining database entries.
localizedText.descCommentRequired: Command to change symbol value must contain a comment
localizedText.maxErrorLogSize: Maximum size of the error log
localizedText.descMaxErrorLogSize: If block commands is disabled, failed database updates are written to a log file. This value describes the max size of the log.
localizedText.descConnectionString: ODBC connection string to the PostgreSQL database
localizedText.auditTrailClearConfirmMsg: Please confirm that you wish to delete all audit trail entries irreversibly
localizedText.name: Name
localizedText.descExportFilter: Condition according to which the audit trail should be filtered (example: 'contextDomain == "ADS"').
localizedText.writeCacheError: Writing audit trail cache to database failed with error: {0}
localizedText.mixedUidsHint: Multiple HMI servers are running with the given PostgreSQL server.
localizedText.addSymbolFailed: Symbol could not be added to the database: {0}
localizedText.addCommandAuditError: Adding audit trail for request failed with error: {0}
localizedText.addEventAuditError: Adding audit trail for event failed with error: {0}
localizedText.finishAuditError: Finishing pending audit trail failed with error: {0}
localizedText.maxDatabaseEntriesAlmostReachedHint: Only {0} free entries left until the maximum database size is reached.
localizedText.maxDatabaseEntriesReachedHint: The maximum number of database entries has been reached. Old entries are overwritten.
localizedText.maxEntriesAdjustedToCurrentSizeHint: The new maximum number of database entries is less than the current number of entries. The maximum number is therefore set to the current size.
localizedText.oldestEntryOverwritten: The oldest database entry has been overwritten because the maximum number of database entries has been reached.
localizedText.decryptLogFailed: Decrypting error logs failed. Log could have been manipulated.
localizedText.createLogBackupFileMessage: Maximum log size has been reached. Current error log is moved to "{0}".
localizedText.createLogBackupFailed: Current error log could not be moved to "{0}". The backup path already exists.
localizedText.auditTrailDatabaseReset: The audit trail database was reset by the user '{0}'.
localizedText.licenseExceededMessage: The schema change of "{0}" has resulted in too many symbols being configured. More licenses are required.
